import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from '@auth0/auth0-angular'; @Component({ selector: 'app-pages', templateUrl: './pages.component.html', styleUrls: ['./pages.component.scss'] }) export class PagesComponent implements OnInit { //pdf sources pdfSource = "https://vadimdez.github.io/ng2-pdf-viewer/assets/pdf-test.pdf"; // src/assets/pdfs/PDFASSET.pdf constructor (public auth: AuthService){} ngOnInit(): void { } }
